#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType AreaOfInterest.

== Name ==

AreaOfInterest (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--AreaOfInterest (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Area of interest on a golf course.
			An area of interest contains a name, a list of coordinates of points, and a specification of its type
			limited to a list of valid values.
			
			Note: An AreaOfInterest can be a line (example: Out-of-bound line along a hole).
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  number = xs:nonNegativeInteger  other = xs:string  type = [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum.html]>  (name, description?, position{2,*}  )</...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || description ||  					Description of an area of interest.				 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name of an area of interest.				 ||
|| [CPositionWithSequence golfml:PositionWithSequence] || [CPositionWithSequence position] ||  Position of a point of the polygon that forms the area of interest. ||      

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| xs:nonNegativeInteger || `number` ||  Position of the area of interest in a list of areas of interest. ||
|| xs:string || `other` ||  				Alternate value for an attribute.			 ||
|| [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum] || `type` ||  				Type of area of interest.			 ||

=== Attribute Detail ===
      

==== number ====

      
				Position of the area of interest in a list of areas of interest.
				This position can be used to "layer" areas of interest.
			
=====  Type: =====

          xs:nonNegativeInteger
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
